show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: The Unhealthy Truth
content:
On Today’s Connect the Dots, PRN host, green health journalist, and Huffington reporter Alison Rose Levy... <!--more--> (www.healthjournalistblog.
com and @alisonroselevy) will speak with Robyn O’Brien, a former food industry analyst, Fulbright grant recipient, the author of The Unhealthy Truth: How Our Food Is Making Us Sick and What We Can Do About It and mother of four, who will offer her insight into the impact that the global food system is having on our health.
